oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisement from Nashville City Directory, 1871
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A page of advertisement from the 1871 Nashville City Directory featuring Stine & Birmingham wholesale and retail groceries, located at the corner of Cedar Street and Public Square in downtown Nashville. Forms part of Nashville City Directory Collection, Metro Archives. 1 digital image.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stine & Birmingham (Nashville, Tenn.)
